name: LO-FI Simulator
description:
Next year, you want to go to the concert of your life, with the girl of your dreams... You have to save your money the show and to buy the plane ticket. Anyway, life is hard, and it constantly throws things that you don't expect. Like a new GF or a cat.....

= How to play = 

- You'll need to save your money to buy a plane ticket from the shop to the girl idol concert. In the meantime, Life will throw difficulty at you. Deal with it as best as you can.

= Control =

     - (Mouse) Choose answer and navigate Ui.
